bikeshop

Interface IBikeShop


  • public interface IBikeShop

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAvailableBikesAsHTML()
      Delivers the list of available bikes within the system as a HTML string.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableBikesAsHTML

        java.lang.String getAvailableBikesAsHTML()
        Delivers the list of available bikes within the system as a HTML string. This method receives the list from the persistence components and transforms it. E.g., if the underlying method returns Awesome Bike, this method returns

        <ul><li>Awesome Bike</li></ul>
        Returns:
        A HTML string representing the list of available bikes. If the underlying method from the persistence returns an empty list, the string N/A will be returned instead. If the underlying method from the persistence throws an exception, the string Error will be returned instead.
